title: March 26 - At Shifa Hospital, the testimonies of the horrors begin to circulate. People executed in cold blood and rape
content:
Toxic information of the Zionist media, relaunched by the media of the governments that support Israel - Meloni government in the lead - and the naked and raw/cruel reality of genocide:

from Milaninmovimento

The ferocious siege ad al shifa hospital is going For a week now , with employment troops unleashed inside the complex and snipers, accompanied by military helicopters, who target anyone who tries to escape from the place.
In total silence of western governments, Israel has transformed a hospital into an area of death and torture where until a few hours ago it was impossible to know what it was happening, above all because of the inability even for the Red crescent, to reach the surrounded place.
Monday 18th March, in fact, heavily armed Israeli forces have Hospital attacked for the second time since October, but paradoxically more fiercely, violent, sadistic and devoid of scruples, shooting against thousands of patients, medical staff and displaced civilians.

The Israeli military spokesman declared that “Terrorists Hamas elderly are using the structure to conduct e Promote terrorist activities ". But this time too we will be sure that the Nethanyahu government will not be interested in spreading evidence of these accusations; this because It is now clear that The orders given to the army of an application now in Gaza, are of spread terror and subjugate the civilian population. Bambin*, elderly, women, people in need of special care, anyone breaths in Gaza can be eliminated in the name of the war in Hamas, e Not even hospitals or locations of humanitarian organizations come saved by this logic.
Until now, the government of Benjamin Netanyahu killed at least 32,226 Palestinians, mostly women and children, and has injured over 80,000 .

Last Saturday, After five days of media black out Around Al Shifa, some Palestinian people have managed to escape and release the first testimonies eye of this that was happening: they said that the tanks and the Israeli armored bulldozers outside the hospital have passed Above at least four bodies and all the remained ambulances intact.
At least 800 men, including journalists and operators health, have been stripped, tied, hooded and deported to An unknown place.
The number of people is unknown executed both inside and near the hospital complex, but Among them there are also doctors and nurses who did not want to abandon their patients.

Jamila al-Hissi, a Palestinian woman left for days trapped in a building bordering the hospital Al-shifa, he revealed Harrowing accounts of assaults carried out by Israeli forces against women and their Family ; the witness, whose words have been filmed Only from some media in the Arab world, he said he had witnessed to scenes of rape and killings of women both overall doctor who in his surroundings.
“ There is something more terrifying than feeling women ask help? "He told MME:" When we have Tried to reach them, they shot us ”.
“ The they raped, kidnapped women, they executed women, have pulled out corpses from under the rubble and triggered on them dogs to eat them .”
Even today, the flow rate of the military siege to this hospital - one of the largest of GAZA - It is not measurable.
description: Toxic information of the Zionist media, relaunched by the media of the governments that support Israel - Meloni government in mind - and naked and ...
author: baronerosso
